name: Blue & Moon Chapter 2
description:
Last night Emma was attacked and almost killed by a demon, saved by the timely arrival of an unknown hero. And that should have been the end of it.

Yet, despite being there too, her friend denies there ever was a demon. While Emma is haunted by the memories of the attack, everyone else is focused on hunting down the hero that saved her.

In order to convince her friends that there’s a bigger threat out there, she needs to prove the events of last night even happened. But how can she do that when she’s the only one who remembers?

Content Advisory: Contains: horror, jumpscares, threat

Openly queer main cast

Comic book inspired visuals

Roughly 1 hours playtime, 11k+ words

Blue & Moon is currently a solo project created in my free time. If you'd like to give your thoughts you can comment here or find me on Twitter or Tumblr.

If you like my work and want to support me, please consider subscribing to my Patreon.
